Depends on what lanes you need to fill Imogen

I'd personally go Vladmir. Quite fun, awesome Soulstealer skin and is quite tanky, pokey.

Go for vlad or brand bro. They are really strong late game and fun to play. Again this is just my opinion don't need to hate. I am the type of guy who enjoys late game champs {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Trundle and Cait are the strongest atm imo.

But i'd wait for this Mage update next patch. Ziggs might be the go after the changes.
What about swain? I'm sold on him ATM...

Nautilus, still deals damage early/mid, scales into an OP vanguard tank mid/late. Can still JG for aggressive playstyle or really screw up a bottom lane as support.

Caitlyn, i use kog and cait as mains... the differences are minor so not worth the IP imo atm. Considering your current style, Nautilus... Trundle can be very boring and easily shut down in low elo, ranked he's solid but he's just always waiting to throw a wall and enter combat. I prefer the ones that can engage or protect at will, not so much one or the other extremely well.

If you wanna climb Elo I would play Nocturne. He is just OP right now in the jungle with 45% CDR. You can find a good guide from a Plat 2 EU-West Player here: http://www.lolking.net/guides/390093

If you just wanna play for fun Ziggs is your way to go.
